title: Apple and cinnamon kugelhopf with honeyed apples
description: A sweet raisin-filled yeasted cake topped with caramelised apples. The recipe calls for a bundt tin, which makes a very pretty cake, but you could use a 900g/2lb loaf tin instead.
ingredients: 2 Golden Delicious apples, peeled, cored and diced (about 220g/8oz after peeling and coring)
5 Golden Delicious apples, peeled, cored and diced
